name: Kpop Idols Challenges
description:
No complex game play
No time rush
Just relax with fun challenges:
*** Big Bang 's challenge: LINKING - Connect same chibi without intersection between lines
*** EXO 's challenge: IMAGINATION - You'll see picture, you'll get letters. What's song should you imagine...
*** SNSD 's challenge: TWINPICs - There're 3 differences between these twinpics!
